verse.name: c1
v1a
v1b
verse.lines:
For the Father waits over the way,
To prepare us a dwelling
place there.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
We shall sing on that
beautiful shore
The melodious songs of the blest,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
And our spirits shall
sorrow no more,
Not a sigh for the blessing
of rest.

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
To our bountiful Father above,
We will offer the tribute
of praise,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
For the glorious gift of His love,
And the blessings that
hallow our days.
